Title: The Secret of Spoons
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on the novel by), Michael Green (developed for television by), Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Michael Green (teleplay by), Bryan Fuller (teleplay by), Maria Melnik (staff writer)
Actors: Ricky Whittle, Emily Browning, Crispin Glover, Bruce Langley
Plot: Mr. Wednesday begins recruitment for the coming battle; Shadow Moon travels to Chicago with Mr. Wednesday and agrees to a high-stakes game of checkers with the old Slavic deity Czernobog.
